result.arabic_text: يُبَصَّرُونَهُمۡۚ يَوَدُّ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُ لَوۡ يَفۡتَدِي مِنۡ عَذَابِ يَوۡمِئِذِۭ بِبَنِيهِ
result.translation: 11. Yalli woo ayro sitta ken yaybulleeh, sitta yaaxigeeniih sittah xiqaanam malón, tokkel umeyni (korosta kinnuk) isi nafsik isi xaylo fidah yaceem faxaah sangeela Qhiyaamah ayroh digaalak.
